extends java.lang.Object
    TestDifferentColorColumn Class Test the efficiency of TestDifferentColorColumn points counter
    Author:
    Luca Massini, Davide Lorenzi (JDocs)

      void testDifferentColorColumn()
      DifferentColorColumn Tester Before the start of this test the grid that is the used is empty Die this test checks if the calculation of the score is correct filling a column of a grid with Die with different color starting with the first to the last.

        SetUp Method This method prepare the new test ambient

      • fillAColumn

        public void fillAColumn(int columnIndex,
                        Grid grid)
        ColumnFiller Tester This method fills a column with Die
        Parameters:
        columnIndex - is the index in the grid of the column that must be filled with different Die (different colors)
        grid - is the grid to be considered

      • testDifferentColorColumn

        public void testDifferentColorColumn()
        DifferentColorColumn Tester Before the start of this test the grid that is the used is empty Die this test checks if the calculation of the score is correct filling a column of a grid with Die with different color starting with the first to the last. For each filling of the column it assert that the expected score is equal to the effective score calculating by the publicScore method

      • fillAllSameColors

        public void fillAllSameColors(Grid grid)
        SameColor Filler Tester This method fills a column using Die of the same color
        Parameters:
        grid - is the grid to be filled with Die colored by Green

      • testDifferentColorColumnRandom

        public void testDifferentColorColumnRandom()
        DifferentRandomColor Tester In this test is checked the calculation of the score in case that the grid ,after the start of this method is filled by Die of the same color. A column of the grid is filled every time with Die that have different colors.And every time that the grid is filled this method asserts if the expected score is equal to the effective score calculated by the publicScore method

      • testDifferentColorColumnSame

        public void testDifferentColorColumnSame()
        DifferentSameColor Tester This test method checks if a the score calculated by the publicScore method is zero when the grid is filled with Die that have the same color.

      • testGetCardNumber

        public void testGetCardNumber()
        GetCardNumber Tester This method tests that is returned the correct card number
